question: Which of the following given functions of the Number Object formats a number with a different number of digits to the right of the decimal?
Which of the following function of the String object returns the character in the string starting at the specified position via the specified number of characters?
In JavaScript the x===y statement implies that:
answers: Both x and y are equal in value, type and reference address as well.
Both are x and y are equal in value only.
Both are equal in the value and data type.
Both are not same at all.
rightAnswer: Both are equal in the value and data type.
